department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown owned portfolio
description: This Bid Solicitation Title is for the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) to provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown owned portfolio in accordance with the Annex A Statement of Work. The services will be provided for the Department of National Defence (DND) by the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA).
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement - Responsive Maintenance Services for CFHA

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified tenderers to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for Responsive Maintenance Services for the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Tender Reference and Solicitation Number**

* Tender Reference: WS4213703724
* Solicitation Number: WS4213703724

**Notice Details**

* Tender Closing Date: February 2, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Number: 4
* Original Publication Date: December 5, 2023

**Procurement Details**

* Project Title: Responsive Maintenance Services for CFHA
* Procurement Category: Service (SRV)
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer (RSO)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Requirements and Documents**

* Offerors must submit all required supporting documentation and bids by February 2, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST.
* An optional teleconference will be held on December 19, 2023 at 1:00 PM EST in English and on December 20, 2023 at 1:00 PM EST in French. Please confirm attendance by December 15, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST.
* Offerors must communicate with the Standing Offer Authority to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

**Notice and Contact Information**

* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18194029?extsite=MTgxOTQwMjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Contact Person: Quinn, Carine Thibodeau, Carine Thibodeau Quinn (She/Her), carinethibodeau.quinn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, and others (refer to the attached notice for the complete list)

**Contracting Entity and End User**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User: Department of National Defence (DND) Reply deleted As stated in the original notice “Une Téléconfé
